title: Simulate Longitudinal Data — simulate_longitudinal_data
text: function generates data frame according simple linear model subject-specific random effects. random slope intercept allowed correlated.

title: Simulate Longitudinal Data — simulate_longitudinal_data
code: simulate_longitudinal_data(   slope,   intercept,   random_effects_vcov,   residual_sd,   observation_times,   n_individuals,   seed = NULL )

title: Simulate Longitudinal Data — simulate_longitudinal_data
text: slope numeric, population average slope intercept numeric, population average intercept random_effects_vcov 2--2 numeric matrix variance-covariance matrix individual level random effects corresponds c(slope, intercept) residual_sd numeric, residual error standard deviation observation_times numeric vector, observation time points n_individuals integer, number individuals generate seed random seed

title: Simulate Longitudinal Data — simulate_longitudinal_data
text: data frame columns subject_id (character), t (numeric) observation time point relative recruitment, value (numeric) observed outcome subject time point t according model.
